definition: to conclude/to determine/to come to a judgment
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: We declare him anathematized and excommunicated and we judge him condemned to eternal fire.
sentences.chinese: 我們宣告他被詛咒及驅逐出教，並斷定他不得永生。

sentences.english: But I concluded that no one ruin is like another.
sentences.chinese: 但我斷定沒有一個廢墟與另外的是相像的。

sentences.english: Heis mpostinge up his mind to quit his job.
sentences.chinese: 他已斷定辭去他的工作。

sentences.english: You can identify single-stage paint by polishing the car.
sentences.chinese: 通過拋光可以斷定是否是單層油漆層。

sentences.english: This means that you and we can't predetermine when everything is ready.
sentences.chinese: 這意味着你們和我們不能提前斷定何時萬事俱備。

sentences.english: This is one of many reasons why intentionality is so difficult to prove.
sentences.chinese: 這是很難斷定故意與否的原因之一。

sentences.english: Many, of course, conclude that Atlantis never really existed.
sentences.chinese: 當然，許多人斷定阿特蘭提斯島根本就不存在。

sentences.english: I can't judge who is right.
Each participant was asked to rate the face's "likeability".
sentences.chinese: 然後每個人都會被要求斷定這張臉的“可愛程度”。

sentences.english: The cow is determined to be a week to kill his left hand.
sentences.chinese: 牛德彩斷定是周軼夫要幹掉他的左右手。

sentences.english: Thus, concluded that the zhang j. x. and meng fis this the sleeper.
sentences.chinese: 由此，斷定了張建新就是這個沉睡者。

sentences.english: What puzzles them, I can tell, is my control.
sentences.chinese: 使他們迷惑不解的，我可以斷定，是我的剋制。

sentences.english: Two previous autopsies by local police concluded that the girl had drowned.
sentences.chinese: 當地警方所做的前兩次驗屍斷定李樹芬是溺水而死。

sentences.english: In the absence of any other explanation, we decided the wind had blown the door open.
sentences.chinese: 因爲沒有別的解釋，所以我們斷定門是被風吹開的。

sentences.english: So then, they will be your judges.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，他們就要斷定你們的是非。

sentences.english: Consequently can break settle, her Duo dead height, above at least in the 6 F.
sentences.chinese: 因此可以斷定，她的墮死高度，至少在六層以上。

definition: to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)
proof/certificate/identification/testimonial/CL:個|个[ge4]/to prove/to testify/to confirm the truth of
